text: Trond Henry Blattmann, 2012 Trond Henry Blattmann (born 23 August 1964) is a Norwegian politician for the Labour Party. From 2009 to 2011 he was a part of Stoltenberg's Second Cabinet as a political adviser in the Ministry of Government Administration, Reform and Church Affairs. He served as a deputy representative to the Parliament of Norway from Vest-Agder during the term 2013-2017. Locally, Blattmann has been a caucus leader in Kristiansand city council. He is a son of Aud Blattmann. He lost a son in the 2011 Utøya shooting and became leader of the National Support Group for the victims. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Deputy members of the Storting Category:Labour Party (Norway) politicians Category:Politicians from Kristiansand
title: Trond Henry Blattmann
